summary: A level 1 female Nord at Riverwood Inn.
descriptionHtml:
Level 1 female Nord at the Riverwood Inn. Quest progression only up to Riverwood, still need to talk to Alvor.
If you want to change certain aspects which is more to your liking, then open up the console and type \"showracemenu\".

===============================================================================================

Installation:
Just copy .ess into:
Documents/ My Games/ Skyrim/ Saves

As you can see from the 3rd image, there is a neck seam present, caused by using Better Females with UNP, as far as I know, I haven\'t seen a texture blender to support UNP and Better Females. If you do then please let me know :).

===============================================================================================

This save will require a few mods to have it looking like it is in the images:
Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/

ApachiiSkyHair V.1.5 Full by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/
(Note: Choose either BASE file, not both)

Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/

Immersive Saturation Boost by Aplestormy
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32064/

============================================================================================
author: blobble
